Create a virtual reality experience where users wear a headset and gloves, and are transported to a world where they can touch and interact with an invisible elephant. The elephant is made of light and sound, and users can feel its presence through vibrations in their fingertips. Confidence Score: 0.8

Develop an app that uses augmented reality to project an invisible elephant onto real-world surfaces. Users can use their device's camera to scan their surroundings, and the app will superimpose the elephant onto the environment in real-time. Users can then interact with the elephant by tapping on it or using voice commands. Confidence Score: 0.9

Create a board game where players take turns rolling dice and moving pieces around a game board. The catch is that the game board is covered in invisible obstacles, and players must use their imagination to navigate around them. The game ends when one player successfully navigates their piece to the end of the board without touching any of the invisible obstacles. Confidence Score: 0.7

Host a "Invisible Elephant" themed escape room where participants must solve puzzles and clues to uncover the hidden elephant. The room is designed to look like a normal office space, but with subtle clues and hints that suggest the presence of an elephant. Confidence Score: 0.6

Create a dance performance where the dancers wear costumes that are designed to look like they are wearing invisible elephants. The dancers will perform choreographed routines that incorporate movements that mimic the graceful movements of an elephant, while also incorporating invisible elements such as floating, gliding, and leaping. Confidence Score: 0.8
